SELECT
m_comment.id as id, m_comment.content as content, m_comment.`root_id` as `root.id`, m_comment.`parent_id` as `parent.id`,
FROM m_comment left join m_comment root ON root.id = m_comment.root_id left join m_comment parent ON parent.id = m_comment.parent_id
m_comment.`id` = #{id}
